::KitKat::

She noticed on her scanner that the Allience base was on the move.
General Desctructor, track the allience ship. Once it lands, we 
attack. No matter where it goes, it can not escape the planet. 
Destructor, if that ship appears to be leaving the planet's 
atmosphere, let me know and we will take off after them."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Paralysis went with Quickstrike. He would help the Subcommander 
with 
> whatever he needed. As for Aracnia, the idea of using Rattrap as 
bait was 
> appealing. 
>     "Quickstrike, You and Paralysis remian here and prepare the 
selfdestruct 
> mechanism. The rest of us are departing to Kitkats." She said, 
looking into 
> his optics.
> 
>     Megatron looked over the radar. For some reason, the Allience 
ship was on 
> the move.....that could be a problem. "General Commander Kitkat," 
Megatron 
> said, because after all she was leading the battle, "Where exactly 
is Zardus 
> going?"
